description: Definitive schema for data submitted and permanently recorded in the Immutable Artifact Ledger (IAL).

fields.name: ArtifactID
fields.description: Canonical hash of the M-02 payload artifact.

fields.name: CommitmentID
fields.description: Unique entry ID within the IAL chain.

fields.name: ParentHash
fields.description: Hash linkage to the previous ledger entry, establishing the cryptographic chain.

fields.name: AACE_Verification_Status
fields.description: Result of integrity check by AACE (must be true for commit).

fields.name: T_Score
fields.description: Terminal Vetting Confidence Score (0.000 to 1.000) from APSM.

fields.name: CommitmentTimestamp
fields.description: UTC Timestamp of irreversible write operation.

fields.name: ProvenanceMetadata
fields.description: Auxiliary trace data (e.g., initiator principal ID, detailed risk metrics).
